snippet: A cutback in year-end bonuses on Wall Street was the main reason Manhattan was the only large county in the country to record a drop in wages for the 12 months that ended in March.
abstract: A cutback in year-end bonuses on Wall Street was the main reason Manhattan was the only large county in the country to record a drop in wages for the 12 months that ended in March.

headline.main: Off Year on Wall St. Drove Down Manhattan Wages, Data Show
